pages.text: The Twisted Blade is a formidable greatsword that is known for its unique and deadly design. The blade of the sword is made of a special type of steel that is known for its ability to twist and contort with each strike.

This twisting motion gives the sword an unprecedented level of speed and power, making it one of the most deadly weapons on the battlefield. The sword's ability to increase in speed with each strike makes it incredibly deadly, as it can quickly wear down an opponent's defenses and strike a fatal blow. Additionally, the sword's unique design also makes it incredibly difficult to block or parry.
